attributes.action: Ban plastic cups, plates & cutlery. Make from biologically-sourced materials.
attributes.additional_details:
Petroleum based plastics will not break down in landfill sites. Yes they can break down by a process known as photodegradation (needs the sun) but this process releases extremely harmful toxins  back into the environment. 
The solution is to have biodegradable cups plates & cutlery.
attributes.background: France has passed a new law to ensure all plastic cups cutlery and plates can be composted and are made of biologically-sourced materials. The UK needs to do the same. Plastics are an ecological disaster that continue to threaten our planet.
